section.p: You are restored to life at the war-god’s temple in Yellowport. Your Stamina is back to its normal score. The possessions and cash you were carrying at the time of your death are lost - cross them off your Adventure Sheet. Also remember to delete the entry in the Resurrection box now it has been used.

The high priest, pale and wan after the effort of interceding with the god to bring you back to life says, ‘You have returned from beyond the dark mirror of death. Tyrnai has granted you another chance - strive to seek battle in his name!’
